column4: After upgrading to Feisty, I now have a network icon on my system tray area that I can't seem to get rid of. Does anyone else have this problem?
That is the network manager for wireles roaming
hmm, I don't have any wireless adapters...
thanks for the suggestion regarding network-manager, that's certainly what was putting the icon in my system tray. That seems strange that there wouldn't be an option to not display it.
